hero.title: Identify technology on websites
hero.text: Wappalyzer is a technographics data provider, uncovering technologies such as content management systems, customer relationship management, ecommerce platforms, advertising networks, marketing tools and analytics.

lookup.title: Technology lookup
lookup.subtitle: Find out what websites are built with
lookup.text: Reveal the technology stack of any website, instantly and for free.

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.subtitle: Create lists of websites that use certain technologies
datasets.text: Technographic datasets provide valuable insights into the software industry and are an essential tool for market research and competitor analysis.

bulk.title: Bulk lookup
bulk.subtitle: Look up a number of websites in one go
bulk.text: Supply your own list of websites to perform a large number of technology lookups in one go. Essential for competitive analysis and understanding your target market.
features: Perform up to 1,000 lookups at once

apis.title: APIs
apis.subtitle: Programmatic access to technographic data
apis.text: The Wappalyzer APIs provide instant access to website technology stacks. Track your prospects' technology choices, examine large numbers of websites or enrich your own datasets.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Get notified when a website's technology stack changes
alerts.text: Monitor your competitor's technology choices with alerts. Be the first to know when they move to a new CMS, ecommerce platform or any other technology.

download.title: Browser extension
download.subtitle: Get the free browser extension
download.text: Install the Wappalyzer browser extension to see the technologies used on websites you visit at a glance.
features: Available on Chrome, Firefox and Edge
